A	<h3>A</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>abbr.</i></font><br>ampere 安<br>\n
abbey	<h3>abbey</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>修道院<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Then he came to a white abbey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这时他来到有一道白墙的修道院。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This's the famous Westminster Abbey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是著名的威斯敏斯特大教堂。</font><br>\n
ABC	<h3>ABC</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>字母表<br>(一个学科的)基础知识<br>按字母顺序排列的指南<br>\n
aboard	<h3>aboard</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>在(船、飞机、车)上, 上(船、飞机、车)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were all aboard the ship last night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天夜里他们都在船上。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在船(或飞机、车)上, 上船(或飞机、车)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The diesels roared, the conductors jumped aboard, and off the train went.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 内燃机发出轰鸣声, 列车员跳上车厢, 火车开走了。</font><br>\n
abolish	<h3>abolish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>废除, 废止<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Americans abolished slavery in 1863.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 美国于1863年废除奴隶制度。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do abolish this kind of bad evil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一定要废除这种恶劣习俗。</font><br>\n
abrupt	<h3>abrupt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>突然的, 意外的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't know the cause of his abrupt leave.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不知道他突然离去的原因。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There were abrupt weather changes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天有不测风云。</font><br>唐突的, 鲁莽的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She always sounds abrupt on the telephone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在电话中听起来她总像很无礼。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An abrupt descent suddenly appeared before him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他面前突然出现一个陡峭的斜坡。</font><br>\n
absent	<h3>absent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>缺席的, 不在场的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At times he would be absent for a couple of days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有时会离开几天。</font><br>缺乏的, 不存在的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Snow is absent in some countries.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些国家不下雪。</font><br>心不在焉的, 恍惚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He listened with an absent air and kept glancing at the door.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一副心不在焉的样子听着, 不时地瞥一眼门。</font><br>\n
absorb	<h3>absorb</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>吸收<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dry earth absorbs water quickly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 干土吸水很快。</font><br>把…并入, 同化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They absorbed a great deal of the Roman culture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们大量地吸收了罗马文化。</font><br>吸引…的注意力, 使全神贯注<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp International affairs absorb his attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他专心研究国际问题。</font><br>\n
abstract	<h3>abstract</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>抽象的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Abstract nouns are usually uncountable nouns in English.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语中的抽象名词通常是不可数名词。</font><br>抽象派的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an abstract painter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是一个抽象派画家。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>抽象, 抽象概念, 抽象性<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's the abstract that is called system analysis.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这就是所谓系统分析这个抽象概念。</font><br>抽象派艺术作品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There're two abstracts on the wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 墙上挂着两幅抽象派画。</font><br>摘要, 梗概<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made an abstract of a long article.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对一篇长文章做了摘要。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>提取, 抽取<br>做…的摘要<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has abstracted the speech.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对讲话作了摘要。</font><br>\n
absurd	<h3>absurd</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>荒谬的, 荒唐的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What an absurd suggestion!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 多么荒唐的建议！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was absurd of you to do such a thing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你做那样的事是愚蠢的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is absurd that they (should) deny my request.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们拒绝我的要求是荒唐的。</font><br>\n

accent	<h3>accent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>口音, 腔调<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He speaks in his broad accent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他说话地方口音很重。</font><br>重音, 重音符号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a secondary accent.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个是次重音。</font><br>强调, 重点<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The accent of the report is on safety.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 报告的重点是安全问题。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>重读<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please accent the first syllable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请重读第一个音节。</font><br>\n

acoustic	<h3>acoustic</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>声音的, 听觉的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Animals use a whole rang of acoustic, visual, and chemical signals in their systems of communication.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 动物利用各种各样的听觉、视觉和化学信号来进行交流。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The microphone converts acoustic waves to electrical singals for transmission.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 麦克风将声波转化成电信号进行传播。</font><br>\n

administrative	<h3>administrative</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>行政的, 管理的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a lot of administrative work to do.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他有许多行政工作要做。</font><br>\n
administrator	<h3>administrator</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>管理者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has proved himself capable as administrator.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他表现出管理才能。</font><br>\n
admirable	<h3>admirable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>令人称赞的; 令人钦佩的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She showed admirable self-control.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她表现出令人钦佩的自我控制。</font><br>\n
admiral	<h3>admiral</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>海军将领, 舰队司令<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an admiral in the US Navy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是美国海军上将。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Admiral Nelson is a strong man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 纳尔逊海军上将是一个强壮的男人。</font><br>\n
admiration	<h3>admiration</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>钦佩; 赞赏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was lost in admiration of the beauty of the scene.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对风景之美赞不绝口。</font><br>引人赞美的人或物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Lei Feng was the admiration of we all.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雷锋是值得我们大家赞美的人。</font><br>\n
admission	<h3>admission</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>准许进入<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He gained admission into the association.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他获准加入这个协会。</font><br>入场费, 入场券<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You have to pay ￡2 admission.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你须付2英镑入场费。</font><br>承认, 供认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made an admission that he was the thief.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他承认他是贼。</font><br>\n
adolescent	<h3>adolescent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>青春期的, 青少年的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The adolescent period is one's best time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 青少年时期是一个人最美好的一段时光。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>青少年<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The audience were mostly adolescents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听众几乎都是年轻人。</font><br>\n
adventure	<h3>adventure</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>冒险活动; 冒险经历; 奇遇<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All the children listened to his adventures with eager attention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们注意力十分集中地听他讲他的冒险经历。</font><br>冒险, 刺激<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The trip to Afghanistan was an adventure for Helen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 到阿富汗旅行对海伦来说是一次冒险的经历。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>冒险<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No man would adventure it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有人敢冒险做这种事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is foolish to haphazardly adventure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 随便冒险是愚蠢的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those explorers gallantly adventured on unknown seas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那些探险家们大胆地在陌生的海域探险。</font><br>\n
adverse	<h3>adverse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不利的, 有害的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Dirt and disease are adverse to the best growth of children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 肮脏与疾病对儿童健康成长不利。</font><br>逆的, 相反的, 敌对的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is adverse to going abroad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他反对出国。</font><br>\n

alien	<h3>alien</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>外国的, 外国人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are alien people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们是外国人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Orange trees are alien to China.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 橘子树是从外国传入中国的。</font><br>陌生的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He quickly adjusts to the alien environment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很快适应陌生的环境。</font><br>性质不同的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The effect was entirely alien from what had been intended.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个结果与原先的意图大相径庭。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>外国人, 外侨, 局外人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp An Englishman is an alien in America.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英国人在美国便是外国侨民。</font><br>外星人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jim is an alien in this film.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 吉姆在这部电影里是个外星人。</font><br>\n

alike	<h3>alike</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>同样的, 相像的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The two office buildings are somewhat alike in appearance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这两座办公楼在外形上有点相似。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The twins are so alike that I can't tell which is which.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这对双胞胎一模一样, 我分辨不出谁是谁。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>同样地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She treats all her students alike.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对她所有的学生都同样看待。</font><br>\n

allowance	<h3>allowance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>津贴, 补助, 零用钱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pension includes an allowance of fifty pounds for traffic expenditures.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 年金中包括50镑交通费补贴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Government officials who travel on business are given traveling allowances.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 因公出差的政府官员享有出差补贴。</font><br>\n
alternate	<h3>alternate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>轮流的, 交替的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That was a week of alternate rain and sunshine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那是晴雨天交替的一周。</font><br>间隔的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He and I clean our room on alternate days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我和他隔日轮流打扫我们的房间。</font><br>代替的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an alternate plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个替代计划。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)交替, (使)轮换<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Day and night alternate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昼夜更替。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Farmers usually alternate their crops.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 农民通常实行轮种。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The young man alternated singing and dancing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那年轻人一会儿唱, 一会儿跳。</font><br>\n

ambitious	<h3>ambitious</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有抱负的, 雄心勃勃的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Only ambitious students get the best marks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有抱负的学生才能取得最好的成绩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Young people, be ambitious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 年轻人, 要胸怀大志。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The actress is ambitious of applause.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这女演员极想得到喝彩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is ambitious to succeed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她极想成功。</font><br>有野心的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is an ambitious man.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个有野心的人。</font><br>\n
ambulance	<h3>ambulance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>救护车<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was sent to hospital by ambulance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 救护车将他送往医院。</font><br>\n
ambush	<h3>ambush</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>埋伏<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A whole regiment of the enemy troop got caught in our ambush was eliminated completely.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 整整一个团的敌军中了我方埋伏后被全部消灭。</font><br>伏击<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Several passers-by were killed in the ambush.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 几名过路人在伏击中被杀害。</font><br>埋伏着的人, 伏兵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He suspected an ambush.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他怀疑有伏兵。</font><br>设埋伏地点, 伏击处<br>\n
amend	<h3>amend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>改良; 修改, 修订<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The thief has amended.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这小偷改过自新了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must amend your pronunciation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你必须改正你的发音。</font><br>\n
ammunition	<h3>ammunition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>弹药, 军火<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When the soldiers had used up all their ammunition, they went on fighting with their swords.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当战士们弹药用完时, 他们继续用刺刀作战。</font><br>\n
amnesty	<h3>amnesty</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>大赦<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new emperor declared a total amnesty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 新皇帝宣布大赦天下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most political prisoners were freed under the terms of the amnesty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大多数政治犯按大赦条例被释放了。</font><br>\n
amongst	<h3>amongst</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)处在…中, 为…所环绕, 为…所环抱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was sitting amongst a group of children, telling them a story.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他正坐在一群孩子中间讲故事。</font><br>(表示方式)以…联合行动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They earned a fortune amongst themselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们共同努力发了财。</font><br>(表示比较)与…比较, 突出于<br>(表示排斥)除…之外(还有)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conference discussed, amongst other things, the problem of environmental protection.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 除了其他问题以外，会上还讨论了环保问题。</font><br>(表示范围)在…之内, 为…所分享[共有], 在…一类之中, 是…中之一, 在…群中<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is the tallest amongst her classmates.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在她同学之中是最高的。</font><br>(表示环境)与…在一起, 与…相处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My wife was there amongst others.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我妻子和其他一些人在那儿。</font><br>(表示牵涉)经过, 涉及<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Unemployment amongst married women reached a peak.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在已婚女性中失业率达到了顶峰。</font><br>(表示关系)相互间, 彼此<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must settle the matter amongst yourselves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你们必须彼此商量, 自行解决这些问题。</font><br>(表示所属)为…所特有; 为…所熟悉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a custom amongst the Germans.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是德国人特有的习俗。</font><br>\n
ample	<h3>ample</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>足够的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun was setting fast, but there was still ample light.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夕阳西下, 天色很快暗下来, 但是还有足够的光线。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Thirty dollars will be ample for the purpose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有30美元足够用了。</font><br>大量的, 丰富的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The election was given ample coverage on TV.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电视上对选举作了广泛的报道。</font><br>\n
amusing	<h3>amusing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>有趣的, 好玩的, 逗人笑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wit made even troubles seem amusing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的风趣能使麻烦事也变得似乎有趣。</font><br>\n
analyse	<h3>analyse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>分析, 分解, 解释<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher tried to analyse the cause of our failure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教师设法仔细分析我们失败的原因。</font><br>\n
ancestor	<h3>ancestor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>祖先, 祖宗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has worshipped her ancestor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她已拜过她的祖先。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The custom of worshipping ancestors is prevalent among these people.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 崇拜祖先的风俗在这些人中是普遍的。</font><br>原型, 先驱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This machine is the ancestor of the modern computer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台机器是现代电脑的始祖。</font><br>\n
anchor	<h3>anchor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>锚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They lay at anchor outside the harbour.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们在港外抛锚停泊。</font><br>给人安全感的物(或人)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Letters from home were an anchor to him when he worked abroad.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在国外工作时, 家书是他的精神支柱。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>抛锚<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They anchored their ship in the river in a foggy morning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在一个迷雾的早晨他们把船停泊在河上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship anchored along the shore.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这船沿岸抛锚。</font><br>担任(电视节目等的)主持人<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She anchors the top-rated news show.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她主持要闻节目。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(把…)系住, (使)固定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We anchored the hammock to the tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们把吊床牢牢地系在树上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The insect anchored fast to its prey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这昆虫紧紧地抓住它的猎物不放。</font><br>\n

anticipate	<h3>anticipate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>先于…行动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They have anticipated us and seized the bridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们抢在我们之前占领了那座桥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A relatively firm material can be anticipated.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 可以提前准备一种较为坚实的材料。</font><br>预感, 期望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The directors anticipated a fall in demand.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 董事们预感需求会降低。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I anticipate deriving much instruction from the lecture.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我期望从这演讲中获得很多教益。</font><br>\n

avert	<h3>avert</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>防止, 避免<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He managed to avert suspicion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他设法避嫌。</font><br>转移<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She averted her eyes from the terrible sight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把目光转开, 不敢去看那可怕的景象。</font><br>\n

awake	<h3>awake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>醒着的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was the only one boy awake at that time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是当时惟一醒着的男孩。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This thought kept me awake all night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种顾虑使我通宵未能合眼。</font><br>觉醒的, 洞察的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The explorer was ever awake for the dangers that surrounded him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个探险家时刻提防着周围的危险。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>醒, 唤醒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She usually awakes at six.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她通常六点醒来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I awoke to find that it was raining.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我醒来后才发现正在下雨。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She slept badly, awoke tired and pale.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她睡得很不好, 醒来时满身疲惫, 面色苍白。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A great noise awoke her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 嘈杂的吵闹声把她吵醒了。</font><br>觉悟到, 使觉悟<br>\n

bruise	<h3>bruise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>瘀伤, 伤痕, 擦伤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was covered with bruises after falling off his bicycle.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从自行车上摔了下来, 摔得浑身伤痕。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The pear had bruises of dark spots.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个梨子有碰伤的黑斑。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)碰伤[擦伤], (使)成瘀伤<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't drop apples, they bruise easily.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 苹果易碰伤, 要小心轻放。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She bruised herself against the desk.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她撞到书桌上, 受了瘀伤。</font><br>\n

bubble	<h3>bubble</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>泡, 水泡, 气泡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When water boils, bubbles rise to the surface.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 水开时, 水面起了泡泡。</font><br>泡影, 幻想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp News of the defeat quickly burst the bubble of our self-confidence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 失败的消息使我们的自信心迅速破灭了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>起泡, 使冒气泡<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He bubbled air into the water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他吹空气入水。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was bubbling over with happiness and enthusiasm.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她洋溢着喜悦和兴奋。</font><br>\n

calculate	<h3>calculate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>计算, 估计<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you calculated the result?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你算出结果来了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I calculated that the trip would take two days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我估计这段路程要走两天时间。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll calculate what it will cost.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要估计一下那要花多少钱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The scientist could not calculate when the spaceship would reach the Jupiter.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位科学家没有算出那艘宇宙飞船什么时候会到达木星。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Astronomers can calculate when there will be eclipses of the sun and moon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天文学家可以算出何时发生日食和月食。</font><br>打算, 旨在<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Emotional people don't stop to calculate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 感情容易冲动的人做事往往不加考虑。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This advertisement is calculated to attract the attention of housewives.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个广告旨在吸引家庭主妇们的注意力。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The speech was calculated to win votes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那演说意在争取选票。</font><br>\n

complication	<h3>complication</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(新出现的)困难, 难题<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The car ran out of petrol, and as a further complication I had no money!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车没油了, 更麻烦的是我身上没有钱！</font><br>〈医〉并发症<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Complications set in, and the patient died.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 病人因出现并发症而死亡。</font><br>\n
compliment	<h3>compliment</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>赞美(话), 恭维(话)<br>向…送礼以表示敬意<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>表扬; 恭维<br>\n
comply	<h3>comply</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>遵从, 依从, 服从<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was told to pay the fine, but refused to comply.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被通知交纳罚款, 但她拒不服从。</font><br>\n
compose	<h3>compose</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>组成, 构成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These twelve men are believed to compose the jury.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 据信, 陪审团是由这12人组成的。</font><br>使安定, 使镇静<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I heard he ask her to compose herself.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我听到他叫她镇定。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>创作(乐曲、诗歌等); 为…谱曲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He teaches music and also composes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他教音乐, 也作曲。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Yesterday he composed a piece of music.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 昨天他作了一首曲子。</font><br>\n
composer	<h3>composer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(尤指古典音乐)作曲家<br>\n
composite	<h3>composite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>混合成的, 综合成的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This composite illustration was made by putting together a number of drawings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这本综合说明书是集若干图片汇合而成的。</font><br>\n
composition	<h3>composition</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>创作, 写作, 作曲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He played a piece of music of his own composition.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他演奏了一首自己创作的曲子。</font><br>作文, 作品<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My composition has not been completed yet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的作文还未写完。</font><br>构图; 构成, 成分<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her drawing is competent, but her composition is poor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的画有功力, 但布局欠佳。</font><br>混合物, 合成物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you studied the composition of the chemicals?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你研究过这种药品的成分了吗?</font><br>\n
compost	<h3>compost</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>混合肥料,堆肥<br>\n
compound	<h3>compound</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>复合物, 化合物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When two or more elements combine and form a compound, a chemical change takes place.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当两种或两种以上的元素结合形成化合物时, 发生化学变化。</font><br>(筑有围墙的)院子, (围起来的)场地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The compound was subdivided into four living areas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个区域被划分成四块居住小区。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使混合, 使合成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He compounded water, sand and soil and formed bricks.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用水拌和沙和泥土做成砖块。</font><br>使严重; 使恶化<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The heavy rain compounded the trouble of the lost hikers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大雨增加了迷路的徒步旅行者们的困难。</font><br>\n
comprise	<h3>comprise</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>包含, 包括, 由…组成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fishing fleet comprises around 70 boats.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 捕鱼船队由大约70艘渔船组成。</font><br>组成, 构成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Twelve departments comprise this university.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 12个系组成了这所大学。</font><br>\n
compulsory	<h3>compulsory</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>必须做的, 强制性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is English a compulsory subject?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 英语是必修课吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Attendance at the meeting is compulsory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会议是必须参加的。</font><br>\n
computerize	<h3>computerize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用计算机做, 使计算机化<br>将(资料)存入计算机<br>\n
computing	<h3>computing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>计算机的运作<br>\n
conceal	<h3>conceal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>隐藏; 隐瞒, 遮住<br>\n
conceive	<h3>conceive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>想出, 构想, 设想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You may conceive a new world in the atomic age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你可以设想出原子时代的新世界。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I conceived that there must be some difficulties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我料想到一定有些困难。</font><br>怀孕<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She has conceived at last.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她终于怀孕了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The woman conceived a child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个妇女怀孕了。</font><br>\n
concentrated	<h3>concentrated</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>集中的,浓缩的<br>\n
conception	<h3>conception</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>思想, 观念, 概念<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's got a pretty strange conception of friendship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对友谊有一种非常独特的见解。</font><br>构想, 设想<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conception of the book took five minutes, but writing it took a year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 构想那本书只花了五分钟, 而写那本书却用了一年。</font><br>怀孕<br>\n
concerning	<h3>concerning</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示论及)关于, 有关, 就…而论<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What do you know concerning this?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 关于这事你知道些什么?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wrote to the head of the firm concerning Robert.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我曾就罗伯特的问题写信给公司的主管。</font><br>\n
condemnation	<h3>condemnation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>谴责,指责,定罪<br>\n
condom	<h3>condom</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(男用)避孕套, 保险套<br>\n
conductor	<h3>conductor</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(乐队)指挥<br>售票员, 列车长<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The bus conductor collected money from the passengers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公共汽车售票员向乘客收钱。</font><br>〈电〉导体<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Copper is a good conductor of heat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 铜是热的良导体。</font><br>\n
confederation	<h3>confederation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>结盟<br>同盟, 联邦<br>\n
confess	<h3>confess</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>承认, 供认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The criminal soon confessed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 罪犯很快就供认了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She confessed hating the boss.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她承认痛恨这个老板。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He confessed where he had hidden the money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他供出了他藏钱的地方。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He confessed himself (to be) guilty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他承认自己有罪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I confessed myself beaten.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我承认自己被击败了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They confessed themselves to have made a great mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们承认自己犯了大错。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He confessed himself out of contact with the times.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他承认自己与时代脱节。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>听…忏悔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The priest confessed the criminal.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 神父听取那罪犯的忏悔。</font><br>\n
confession	<h3>confession</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>承认; 自首, 供认<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've got a confession to make, I scraped your car when I was parking mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有件事我得向你讲出来, 我在停放汽车时把你的车子刮坏了。</font><br>声明, 表白(指宗教信仰)<br>(向神父的)忏悔, 告解<br>\n
confidential	<h3>confidential</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>秘密的, 机密的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please lock up these confidential reports.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把这些机密报告锁起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The results of conference are still confidential.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 会议决议仍保密。</font><br>表示信任或亲密的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have a confidential exchange of views.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们推心置腹地交换意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't become too confidential with strangers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 对陌生人不要什么话都说。</font><br>担任机密工作的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is a confidential secretary of Mr. Smith.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是史密斯先生的一个机要秘书。</font><br>\n
confine	<h3>confine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>限制; 局限于<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She confined her activities in educational circles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她把她的各项活动都限制在教育圈内。</font><br>禁闭; 管制; 关起来<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They confined the prisoner in a cell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们把犯人监禁在监狱里。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>界限, 范围<br>\n
confined	<h3>confined</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>(指空间)有限的, 受限制的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is hard to work efficiently in such a confined space.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这样狭小的空间里工作很难提高效率。</font><br>\n
conform	<h3>conform</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>遵守, 符合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The building does not conform to safety regulations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这座建筑物不符合安全条例。</font><br>顺应, 一致<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is great pressure on schoolchildren to conform.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小学生有巨大的压力要去适应。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her ideas do not conform with mine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的观点与我的不一致。</font><br>\n
confuse	<h3>confuse</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使困惑, 把…弄糊涂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They asked so many questions that they confused me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们问了许多问题, 都把我弄糊涂了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many people are confused about the new ways of measuring temperature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多人都搞不清测定温度的新方法。</font><br>混淆, 把…混同<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an attempt to confuse form and[with] substance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是企图把形式同实质混淆。</font><br>混乱, 搞乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These verbs are often confused.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些动词常被弄混。</font><br>\n
confused	<h3>confused</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>糊涂的, 迷乱的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All your changes of plan have made me totally confused.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你把计划改来改去, 我都糊涂了。</font><br>混杂的, 不清楚的<br>\n
confusing	<h3>confusing</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>莫名其妙的, 难以理解的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The instructions on the box are very confusing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 盒子上的使用说明含混不清。</font><br>\n
confusion	<h3>confusion</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>困惑, 糊涂<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His answers to my questions have only added to my confusion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对我的问题的回答只是使我更加困惑不解。</font><br>混淆, 混同<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There have been some of confusion names.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有些名字弄混了。</font><br>混乱, 骚乱<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His unexpected arrival threw us into total confusion.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的突然来访使我们完全不知所措。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In the ensuing confusion another eight persons were hurt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在随后的骚动中, 又有八人受伤。</font><br>\n
congratulate	<h3>congratulate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>祝贺, 道喜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is to be congratulated for his success.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他将会由于取得的成就而受到祝贺。</font><br>\n
conjunction	<h3>conjunction</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>连词<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp “And”, “but”and“whereas” are conjunctions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp and, but和whereas是连词。</font><br>结合; 联合<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The conjunction of heavy rains and strong winds caused flooding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大雨和大风加在一起造成了洪水泛滥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We are working in conjunction with the police.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们与警方配合进行工作。</font><br>\n
connect	<h3>connect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>连接, 联结<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wires connect under the floor.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 电线是在地板下接通的。</font><br>把…看作有关联; 由…联想到<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cannot connect the two things in my mind.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在我心中, 我无法将这两件事情联系在一起。</font><br>给…接通电话<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The telephone operator connected us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 话务员给我们接通了电话。</font><br>\n
connected	<h3>connected</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>连接的, 有关系的, 有联系的<br>有社交[职业、商业]关系的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's well connected in political circles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在政界结识了不少有权有势的人物。</font><br>有血统[婚姻]关系的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Most European royal families are connected with each other.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 欧洲大部分王室都有姻亲关系。</font><br>\n
conquer	<h3>conquer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>攻克, 征服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have conquered the enemy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们战胜了敌人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When will scientists conquer the stars?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 科学家什么时候能征服恒星呢?</font><br>破除, 克服<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I conquered my dislike for mathematics.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我克服了讨厌数学的毛病。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>得胜<br>\n
conscience	<h3>conscience</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>良心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I had a guilty conscience about not telling her the truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我因为没有告诉她事实真相而感到内疚。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After he had committed the crime, his conscience was troubled.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他犯罪后, 良心上感到很不安。</font><br>\n
consecutive	<h3>consecutive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>连续的, 连贯的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was reelected for four consecutive terms.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他连着四任当选。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The numbers 7, 8, 9 are consecutive.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 7、8、9这三个数字是连续的。</font><br>\n
consensus	<h3>consensus</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(意见等)一致, 一致同意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Can we reach a consensus on this issue?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们能在这个问题上取得一致意见吗?</font><br>\n
consent	<h3>consent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>准许, 同意, 赞成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her parents refused their consent to the marriage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的父母对这桩婚姻持反对态度。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>同意; 赞成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My parents have consented.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父母已经同意了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Joe's mother consents to let him live with his girlfriend, but his father doesn't.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 乔的母亲同意让他和女朋友住在一起, 但父亲却反对。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father won't consent to my leaving school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我父亲不会同意让我辍学。</font><br>\n
consequently	<h3>consequently</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>所以, 因此<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was a bright and eager student and, consequently, did well in school.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是个聪明好学的学生, 因此学习成绩很好。</font><br>\n
conservation	<h3>conservation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>保存, 保护, 避免浪费<br>对自然环境的保护<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is interested in conservation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对保护环境这个问题十分关心。</font><br>\n
console	<h3>console</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>安慰, 慰问<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We tried to console her when her dog died.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的狗死后, 我们尽力安慰她。</font><br>\n
consolidate	<h3>consolidate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)巩固; (使)加强<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We've made a good start, now it's time to consolidate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们有了一个良好的开端, 现在应该加以巩固。</font><br>(使)合并<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those two banks have consolidated and formed a single large bank.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那两家银行已合并成一家大银行。</font><br>\n
consortium	<h3>consortium</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(数家公司或银行联合组成的)财团, 联营企业<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The new aircraft was developed by a European consortium.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种新飞机是一家欧洲财团出资研制的。</font><br>\n
conspiracy	<h3>conspiracy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>阴谋, 密谋<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The men were found guilty of conspiracy to murder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些人被裁决犯有阴谋杀人罪。</font><br>\n
constable	<h3>constable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈英〉警察<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Could you please help me, Constable?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察, 您能帮助我吗?</font><br>\n
constituency	<h3>constituency</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>(选举国会议员的)选区<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our constituency covers the city's poorest areas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的选区包括该城市最贫困的地区。</font><br>选区的全体选民<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The constituency are voting tomorrow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 选民明天投票。</font><br>(政客或政党的)支持者, 赞助者<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Big business is his most important constituency.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大企业是他最重要的支持者。</font><br>\n
constituent	<h3>constituent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>选民<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The minister's constituents feel that he does not spend enough time dealing with their problems.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 选民认为那位部长并没有花上足够的时间去处理他们的问题。</font><br>成分, 构成部分, 要素<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Hydrogen and oxygen are the constituents of water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 氢和氧是水的主要成分。</font><br>\n
constitute	<h3>constitute</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>构成, 组成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Twelve months constitute a year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 12个月为一年。</font><br>建立, 制定<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They constituted an acting committee.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们设立了一个临时委员会。</font><br>选定, 任命<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The company will constitute you captain of the ship.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 公司将任命你担任这艘船的船长。</font><br>\n
constraint	<h3>constraint</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>强制; 限制, 约束<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He felt constraint in her presence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在她面前显得局促不安。</font><br>强制, 强迫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We obeyed, but under constraint.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们服从了, 然而是被迫的。</font><br>\n
construct	<h3>construct</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>修建, 建立<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They constructed the bridge in a year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们花一年时间建起了那座桥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has constructed a new theory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他建立了一种新理论。</font><br>构成, 组成<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The composition is well constructed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这篇文章的构思很不错。</font><br>\n

consume	<h3>consume</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>消耗, 消费, 耗尽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Arguing about details consumed many hours of the committee's valuable time.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 争论细节问题耗费了委员会数小时宝贵的时间。</font><br>大吃, 大喝<br>烧毁, 毁灭<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The fire soon consumed the wooden buildings.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大火很快就把那些木制建筑物烧毁了。</font><br>\n
consuming	<h3>consuming</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>强烈的<br>\n
consumption	<h3>consumption</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>消费, 消耗; 消费[耗]量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The food was declared unfit for human consumption.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种食品被宣布不适于人吃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Consumption of oil has declined in recent years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 石油消耗量在最近几年下降了。</font><br>肺病; 结核病<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She died of consumption.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她死于肺结核。</font><br>\n
container	<h3>container</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>容器<br>集装箱, 货柜<br>\n
contaminate	<h3>contaminate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>把…弄脏, 污染<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They are contaminating the minds of our young people with these subversive ideas.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们这些颠覆作乱的思想是对我们年轻人的精神污染。</font><br>\n
contemplate	<h3>contemplate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>深思, 细想, 仔细考虑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The possibility of war is too horrifying to contemplate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战争的可能性太可怕了, 真不堪细想。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor contemplated the difficult operation he had to perform.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生仔细地考虑他所要做的棘手的手术。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The government has contemplated reforming the entire tax system.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府打算改革整个税收体制。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We don't contemplate his[him] opposing our plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们预料他不会反对我们的计划。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He contemplated what the future would be like.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他思忖着将来会如何。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He contemplated my advice as nothing.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他不把我的建议当回事。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>注视, 凝视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She stood contemplating the painting.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她站在那儿凝视那幅图画。</font><br>\n
contempt	<h3>contempt</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>轻视, 轻蔑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her contempt for foreigners was obvious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她对外国人的蔑视显而易见。</font><br>\n
contend	<h3>contend</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>争夺, 竞争<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The firm is too small to contend against large international companies.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这家公司太小, 无法与国际性的大公司竞争。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When a marriage ends, the former husband and wife often contend over the children.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夫妇双方在婚姻破裂后, 往往会争夺子女。</font><br>搏斗, 争斗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sisters contended about silly trifles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 姐妹们为鸡毛蒜皮的小事而争斗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have to contend with difficulties.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我得与困难做斗争。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>声称, 主张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He contended that there must be life on Mars.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他声称火星上面一定有生物。</font><br>\n
contender	<h3>contender</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>斗争者,竞争者<br>\n
content	<h3>content</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>所容纳之物, 所含之物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The police emptied her bag and examined the contents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 警察倒出她包中的东西检查。</font><br>(书等的)内容, 目录<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In my opinion the movie lacks contents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 依我看, 这部电影缺乏实质性内容。</font><br>容量, 含量<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp No other food has so high an iron content.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 没有别的食物有这么高的含铁量。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>满足的, 满意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Now that she has apologized, I am content.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 既然她已经道了歉, 我也就满意了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was content that the thing had happened.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这事终于发生, 对此他是满意的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>满足, 满意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cat lay stretched out beside the fire in sleepy content.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那只猫伸展四肢躺在炉边睡得很满足。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使满足, 使满意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Simple praise is enough to content him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 简单的称赞就能使他满足了。</font><br>\n
contention	<h3>contention</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>竞争, 争夺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Three players are in contention to win the title.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 三个运动员在争夺这个项目的冠军。</font><br>争论, 争执<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is an issue of great contention at the moment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 眼下这个问题是争论的热点。</font><br>论点, 主张<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I strongly oppose that contention.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我强烈地反对那种主张。</font><br>\n

continual	<h3>continual</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不间断的, 不停的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am tired of this continual rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不停的下雨使我厌倦。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Church Street is continual with High Street.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 教堂街与高街相连。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is continual that he glanced at Simon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他一直盯着西蒙看。</font><br>多次重复的, 频繁的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has continual arguments with his father.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他屡次跟他父亲争论。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That sort of thing is quite continual.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种事经常有。</font><br>\n
continuous	<h3>continuous</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>连续的, 没有中断的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The brain needs a continuous supply of blood.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大脑需要不断供给血液。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must be continuous to study.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须不断学习。</font><br>\n

convenient	<h3>convenient</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>方便的, 便利的, 合适的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I have to find a convenient location for the shelves.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我得找一合适的地方放这些书架。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp May I come and talk with you whenever it's convenient?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在你方便时我能来和你谈谈吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is it convenient for you to go out tonight?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 今晚你方便出去吗?</font><br>附近的, 近便的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is useful to have a convenient supermarket.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 附近有超市实在方便。</font><br>\n

cop	<h3>cop</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>警察<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After he hit me, I called the cops to come to get him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他打了我, 于是我就报警, 让警察来抓他。</font><br>\n

cross	<h3>cross</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>十字架<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Jesus died on the cross.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 耶稣死在十字架上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They marked the exact place of that hospital with a red cross.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用一个红十字标出那所医院所在的确切位置。</font><br>十字形饰物<br>画十字的动作<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a cross over his head.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在他头上画了一个十字。</font><br>杂交品种; 混合物<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A mule is a cross between a mare and a donkey.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 骡子是雌马和驴的杂交种。</font><br>痛苦, 苦难<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We all have our cross, I suppose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我想我们大家都有苦难。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>穿过, 越过, 渡过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They crossed from England to France.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从英国渡过海峡到法国去。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We have to cross the railway line by the foot bridge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不得不从人行桥上越过铁路线。</font><br>交叉, 相交; 错过<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Line A crosses line B at right angles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A线与B线成直角相交。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>反对, 阻挠; 使受挫折<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cross me and you'll regret it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 和我作对, 你会后悔的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>坏脾气的, 易怒的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cross and hungry children came in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 又气又饿的孩子们走了进来。</font><br>相反的, 反向的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was just a result cross to our purpose.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这恰恰是与我们的目的相反的结果。</font><br>\n

damn	<h3>damn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>非常<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I feel a damn sight better than I did yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我感觉比昨天好多了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He would know damn well better on time tonight or I am leaving without him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他应该明白今晚得准时来, 否则我就自个走。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't lie to me.You know damn well what was happening.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 别瞒我了, 你压根就很清楚发生了什么事。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I knew damn well what he was going to say.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我非常清楚他要说什么。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'll damn well do as you're told!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 告诉你做什么你他妈的就做什么！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She works damn hard.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她工作得真够努力的。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>该死的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Where's that damn book?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那本该死的书在哪儿?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>罚…入地狱受罪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Damn you!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该死的！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Damn this useless typewriter!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这台破打字机真该死！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Should all criminals be damned?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 所有的罪犯都该咒骂吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had rather be damned with Plato than saved with those who anathematized him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他宁可让自己的灵魂与柏拉图一道被罚入地狱, 也不愿和谴责他的人们一起升入天国。</font><br>严厉批评<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The play was damned by the reviewers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这部戏被评论家们批评得一无是处。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The department's review damned the whole system.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该部门的评述严厉批评了整个系统。</font><br>使彻底失败, 毁掉<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She damned herself with one stupid remark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被自己的一句蠢话毁了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>一点点, 丝毫<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't care a damn what he does.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他干什么我一点儿也不在乎。</font><br>\n
damned	<h3>damned</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>该死的,被咒骂的;使人憎厌的,糟透的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>非常,十分,极<br>\n
damp	<h3>damp</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>潮湿的, 不完全干燥的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like a damp weather.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不喜欢潮湿的天气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The damp air makes my old bones hurt.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 潮湿的空气伤着了我的这把老骨头。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The statue was erected in a damp grove at Olympia.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雕像建造在奥林匹亚潮湿的小树林中。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is too much damp here.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里太潮湿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The building was cold and damp.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那房子又冷又湿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Everything gets damp on raining days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 雨天什么东西都变湿了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My clothes are damp from the rain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的衣服被雨水打湿了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>潮湿, 湿气<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We shivered in the damp of the forest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们因树林里的湿气而打寒颤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mary's illness cast a damp over the party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 玛丽病了, 这使参加聚会的人很扫兴。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使潮湿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Damp the cloth, please.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把这块布弄湿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You should damp clothes before ironing them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在熨衣服之前应将衣服打湿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She damped her cloth before cleaning the window.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 擦窗之前她先把抹布弄湿。</font><br>减弱, 抑制<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My failure last time has not damped my interest.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上一次的失败没有使我的兴趣减弱。</font><br>使沮丧, 使败兴<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Nothing could damp his spirits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 任何事情都不能使他精神消沉。</font><br>\n

dart	<h3>dart</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>投掷; 投射<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sun darts its beams.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 阳光四射。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>向前冲; 飞奔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy darted into the room.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那男孩冲进房间。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>飞镖<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He likes throwing darts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他喜欢射飞镖。</font><br>急驰, 飞奔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She made a dart for the exit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她冲向出口。</font><br>\n
dash	<h3>dash</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>冲; 猛冲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse dashed onward.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那匹马向前直冲。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>猛掷; (使)猛撞<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't dash stones! It's dangerous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不要扔石头, 那样做危险。</font><br>匆匆地写或画<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She dashed some paint on the paper and called it a tree.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她在纸上涂抹了些颜料, 说这就是一棵树。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>猛冲, 飞奔<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The prisoners made a dash for freedom.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 囚犯逃奔自由。</font><br>短距离赛跑<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The contestants lined up for the 100-yard dash.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 参赛选手列队参加100码短跑。</font><br>少许<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Give him a glass of water with a dash of whisky in it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给他一杯水, 加少许威士忌。</font><br>破折号<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dash is longer than the hyphen.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 破折号比连字符稍长点。</font><br>\n
dawn	<h3>dawn</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>黎明, 拂晓<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dawns here in the mountains are very beautiful.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这里山区的黎明是很美的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Did you hear the cock crow at dawn?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 黎明时你听到鸡叫了吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp At dawn we broke through the barbed wire entanglements under the city wall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拂晓我们突破了城墙的铁丝网。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They got across the bridge before dawn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们于破晓前过了那座桥。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They work from dawn till dark.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们从天亮一直工作到天黑。</font><br>开端, 萌芽<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The war was ended and we looked forward to the dawn of much happier days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 大战结束了, 我们盼望着更加美好的日子的来临。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>破晓; (天)刚亮<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Day dawns in the east.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 东方破晓。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The morning dawned brightly.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 拂晓天气晴朗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The day was just dawning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天刚亮。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Day will soon dawn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天很快就亮了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The day was dawning when we set out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们出发时天刚破晓。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They were waiting for the day to dawn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们正在等待天明。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Last Sunday dawned a perfect day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 上星期日, 一早就是个好天气。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The morning dawned fresh and clear after the storm at night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 夜里暴风雨过后, 拂晓清新而晴朗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp After the storm at night, the morning dawned clear and fine over the bay.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 经过一夜的暴风雨之后, 海湾的早晨分外晴朗。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The next day dawned bright and sunny.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 第二天一大早阳光灿烂。</font><br>开始出现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The space age dawned in the twentieth century.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 太空时代开始于二十世纪。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A new age dawned with the invention of the radio.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 随着无线电的发明, 一个新时代开始了。</font><br>\n
daylight	<h3>daylight</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>日光, 白昼<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll keep on driving while there's still daylight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 趁着天亮, 我们继续往前开车。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp To get there on time we must leave before daylight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 为了准时到那里, 我们必须在天亮之前离开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is easier to read by daylight than by lamplight.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在日光下读书比在灯光下读书舒适。</font><br>\n

decent	<h3>decent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>正派的, 合乎礼仪的, 得体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I didn't have a decent dress for the dance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我没有参加舞会的合适的衣服。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Those tight trousers of yours aren't very decent!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你那条紧身裤真不雅观！</font><br>像样的, 过得去的, 体面的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is not decent to do so.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样做是有失体统的。</font><br>令人满意的, 相当好的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He earns a decent wage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他挣一份很不错的工资。</font><br>\n

deem	<h3>deem</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>认为, 相信<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't you deem that it is your duty to help?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你不认为助人是你的责任吗?</font><br>\n
deepen	<h3>deepen</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>变深, 加深<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her wrinkles deepen with age.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的皱纹随年龄增长而变深。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We'll have to deepen the well if we want more water.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果我们想要更多的水, 就得把井加深。</font><br>\n
deer	<h3>deer</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>鹿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Deer are herbivorous.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 鹿是食草动物。</font><br>\n
default	<h3>default</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>违约; 拖欠债务<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He defaulted in his payments on the loan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他没有按期偿还贷款。</font><br>弃权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He defaulted in the wrestling tournament.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在摔跤比赛中弃权了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>违约; 缺席; 拖欠<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The defendant made default yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 被告昨天未到庭。</font><br>弃权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He lost the world title by default.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他由于弃权而失去了世界冠军的称号。</font><br>\n
defect	<h3>defect</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>缺点, 过失, 瑕疵<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We must correct our defects as soon as possible.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们必须尽快纠正我们的缺点。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>变节, 叛变, 脱离<br>\n

defiance	<h3>defiance</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>违抗, 挑衅的态度; 蔑视<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She acted in defiance of my orders.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她违抗我的命令。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He slammed the door in a spirit of defiance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他以挑衅性的态度把门砰地一下关上。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He climbed the ladder in defiance of the warning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他无视警告爬上了那架梯子。</font><br>\n
defiant	<h3>defiant</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>公然违抗的; 蔑视的; 挑衅的; 目中无人的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With a last defiant gesture, they sang a revolutionary song as they were led away to prison.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们被带走投入监狱时, 仍以最后的反抗姿态唱起了一支革命歌曲。</font><br>\n
deficiency	<h3>deficiency</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>缺乏, 不足, 短缺<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The deficiencies in the system soon became obvious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种制度的缺陷不久就变得很明显。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Cosmetics do not always cover up the deficiencies of nature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 化妆品未能掩饰天生的缺陷。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp During the war children suffered from a deficiency of food.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 战争期间孩子们遭受缺乏食物之苦。</font><br>\n
definite	<h3>definite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>明确的, 确切的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We demand a definite answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们要求明确的答案。</font><br>一定的, 肯定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The doctor is quite definite about Tom having measles.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 医生十分肯定汤姆得了麻疹。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's definite that he will come to help us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他肯定会来帮助我们。</font><br>\n
definitive	<h3>definitive</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>决定性的, 明确的, 权威性的, 不能或不必改变的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Her book is the definitive works on Milton.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她的书是论述密尔顿的定论性著作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We got a definitive victory.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们取得了决定性的胜利。</font><br>\n
defy	<h3>defy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>公然反抗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He defied his opponents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他公然反抗他的对手们。</font><br>不服从; 不尊重<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If you defy the law, you may find yourself in prison.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你不服从法律, 你就可能会坐牢。</font><br>有无法克服的困难<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His strange behaviour defies understanding.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他古怪的举止使人难以理解。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This defies to be explained.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这难以解释。</font><br>\n

desirable	<h3>desirable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>可取的, 值得拥有的, 合意的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My desire for a desirable house will come true in the near future.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要买一幢称心如意的房子的愿望在不久的将来会实现。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Some reasonable adjustments seem desirable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 某些合理的调整似乎是可取的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp For this job it is desirable to know something about medicine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 做这项工作最好能懂点医学。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is most desirable that they should both come.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们俩都来, 这是最好不过了。</font><br>\n
despair	<h3>despair</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>绝望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Defeat after defeat filled us with despair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 一次又一次的失败使我们完全绝望了。</font><br>使人绝望的人(或事物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy is the despair of his teachers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这男孩使老师们感到无可救药。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>绝望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Don't despair; things will get better soon.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 不必绝望, 事情不久就会好起来。</font><br>\n
