tense	<h3>tense</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>拉紧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is the rope tense?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 绳子拉紧了吗?</font><br>肌肉绷紧的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I cannot play the piano like I used to—my fingers have gone tense from lack of practice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不能像过去那样弹钢琴了——我的手指因缺乏练习变得生硬了。</font><br>神经紧张的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He read the letter with a tense anxiety.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他紧张焦虑地看那封信。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We were tense with expectancy.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们因期待而神经紧张起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>(使某人或某物)变得紧张<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈语〉(动词的)时态<br>\n
tent	<h3>tent</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>帐篷<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children had a midnight feast in their tents.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们半夜在帐篷里饱餐了一顿。</font><br>帐, 罩<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Put a tent over his legs to stop them being rubbed by the sheets.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 给他的腿盖上罩子, 以免被床单摩擦。</font><br>\n

trim	<h3>trim</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>修剪, 整修<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The gardener trimmed the hedge.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位园林工人修剪了树篱。</font><br>除去, 削减<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Ask the meat man to trim away the fat edges of the meat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请卖肉师傅把这块肉边上的肥膘切掉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You must trim your costs if you want to make bigger profits.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果你想获得更大的利润, 就必须削减开支。</font><br>装饰<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>整齐的, 整洁的, 匀称漂亮的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He keeps his room trim.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把房间整理得井然有序。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She looks very trim.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她看起来很苗条。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>修剪<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went to the hairdresser's for a trim.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她到理发店理发去了。</font><br>准备就绪, 井井有条, 整整齐齐, 状态极佳<br>\n

triple	<h3>triple</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>三倍的, 三方的, 三部分的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He received triple wages for all his extra work.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 由于额外的工作他领取了三倍的工资。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>(使)增至三倍<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The enemy tripled his strength.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 敌军把兵力增加到原来的三倍。</font><br>\n

underline	<h3>underline</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在…下面画线<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Underline the sentence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在这个句子下面画线。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please underline the noun clauses in the passage.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请用线画出短文中的名词性从句。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He underlined his signature with a little flourish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他挥笔在签名下画了一条线。</font><br>加强, 强调<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That article underlined the same problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那篇文章强调了同一个问题。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp In his speech he underlined several points.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在讲话中强调了几点。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She underlined her disapproval of the proceedings by walking out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她退席以表示不赞成这些做法。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The sudden summoning of the Cabinet underlines the seriousness of the situation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 内阁会议的突然召开, 突出了局势的严重性。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The accident at the factory underlines the need of better safety standards.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 工厂里发生的事故表明了需要更高的安全标准。</font><br>\n
underlying	<h3>underlying</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>根本的, 基础的<br>含蓄的, 潜在的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The underlying theme of the novel is very serious.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 小说隐含的主题是十分严肃的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This word has its underlying meaning.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个单词有它潜在的含义。</font><br>\n
underneath	<h3>underneath</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>在…下面; 在…底下<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ball rolled underneath the table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 球滚到了桌下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What have you got underneath your shirt?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的衬衫里面有什么?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He staggered underneath a burden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他在重负下摇摇晃晃。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They lived underneath a crushing tyranny.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们生活在难以忍受的暴政下。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Underneath his rather severe manner, he is really very kindhearted.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他待人态度相当严厉, 但心地确实十分善良。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>在下面[底下]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you looked underneath?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那底下你找过了吗?</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>底面, 底部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There's a crack on the underneath of the bowl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 碗底有一道裂缝。</font><br>\n
understandable	<h3>understandable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>能懂的; 可理解的; 可同情的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's quite understandable that she was annoyed.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她被惹恼了, 这很能理解。</font><br>\n
undertake	<h3>undertake</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>担任, 承揽; 保证<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I want you to undertake all the responsibility.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要你承担所有的责任。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who will undertake the job of decorating the auditorium?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁来负责装饰礼堂的工作?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll leave you to undertake an important mission.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要让你承担一项重要使命。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The lawyer undertook the case.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 该律师承办这个案子。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He undertook the leadership of the team.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他担任了这个团队的领导。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp If the equipment is not up to the agreed specifications and quality, we will undertake to replace them.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 如果设备达不到议定的规格质量, 我们将负责调换。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I can undertake that you will enjoy the play.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我保证你会喜欢这个剧。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We can't undertake that you will make a profit.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们不能保证你会获利。</font><br>着手, 开始<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He undertakes a dangerous job.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他从事一项危险的工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Their team will undertake exploration for oil.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们队将着手进行石油勘探工作。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She undertook to revise my compositions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她着手批改我的作文。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Next he undertook to pay off the debts.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 然后, 他负责偿还债务。</font><br>\n
underway	<h3>underway</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>在进行中的<br>\n
underwrite	<h3>underwrite</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>在(保险单, 尤指船舶保险单)下方签署并承担责任(承保损失或损坏之责)<br>(按商定的价格)认购(某公司)的全部剩余证券; 包销(证券)<br>同意资助(某事业)<br>\n
undoubted	<h3>undoubted</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>无疑的; 肯定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is undoubted star of British ballet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她是英国毋庸置疑的芭蕾明星。</font><br>\n
uneasy	<h3>uneasy</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>心神不安的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She had an uneasy feeling that they were still following her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她有一种他们仍在跟踪她的不安感觉。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He feels uneasy today.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他今天心里感到不安。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am uneasy about this decision.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我为这一决定感到不安。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was one thing that made me very uneasy after hearing what he had said.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 听了他的讲话后, 我感到非常不安。</font><br>不稳定的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The nuclear deterrent has maintained an uneasy peace.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 核威慑一直使和平处于不稳定状态。</font><br>不舒服的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She felt uneasy with her new in-laws.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她和新姻亲在一起感到不自在。</font><br>\n
unemployed	<h3>unemployed</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>被解雇的; 失业的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are now over four million unemployed workers in this country.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这个国家现有四百万失业人员。</font><br>不在使用中的; 未用的<br>\n
unfold	<h3>unfold</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>显露, 展现<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As I opened the scroll, a panorama of the Yellow River unfolded.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我打开卷轴时, 黄河的景象展现在眼前。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp As the mist cleared, a most beautiful view unfolded before their eyes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 薄雾散去, 美丽的景色逐渐呈现在他们的眼前。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>展开, 打开<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Buds unfold in the sunshine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 花蕾在阳光下开放。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The story unfolds as the film goes on.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 情节随着影片的进展逐步展开。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He unfolded a map.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他摊开地图。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp When he came across his close friend, he unfolded his arms and hugged him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他遇到密友时, 张开双臂紧紧拥抱对方。</font><br>\n
unfortunate	<h3>unfortunate</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>不幸的, 倒霉的; 时运不佳的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He hurled curses at the unfortunate man who had made the mistake.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对着这个犯了错误的可怜人大声叫骂。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I count myself to be unfortunate.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我认为我自己时运不佳。</font><br>可叹的, 令人遗憾的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is indeed unfortunate!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那的确是令人遗憾的！</font><br>不合适的, 粗野的, 不得体的<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>不幸的人<br>\n
unification	<h3>unification</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>统一, 联合, 一致<br>\n
unify	<h3>unify</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>使联合, 统一<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The emperor unified the country by the sword.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那位皇帝用武力统一了全国。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp How can we unify such scattered islands into a nation?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们怎么才能把如此分散的岛屿统一成一个国家呢?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Spain was unified in the 16th century.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 西班牙是在16世纪统一的。</font><br>使相同; 使一致<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The teacher unified the answer of her pupil with hers.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 老师核对了学生的答案。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Someone in charge of quality control should unify the printing with the rest of the book.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 质量检查人员应使该书的印刷质量与其他方面相称。</font><br>\n

universal	<h3>universal</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>全体的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His speech met with universal applause.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的演讲博得全场的喝彩。</font><br>广泛的, 普遍的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's a universal truth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一个普遍真理。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These habits are both universal among mankind and peculiar to individuals.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些习惯在全人类中很普遍, 而对个人来说又很独特。</font><br>在世界各地的, 世界性的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Climate change is a universal problem.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 气候变化是个世界性的问题。</font><br>\n

up	<h3>up</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>成直立姿势; 起床<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They stood up when he came in.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他进来时, 他们都站起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He got up very late.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他很晚才起床。</font><br>向上, 趋于较高处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Please lift your head up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 请把头抬起来。</font><br>向北, 在北部<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She lives up north.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她住在北部。</font><br>完全地, 彻底地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We finished all work up.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们完成了所有的工作。</font><br>成碎片; 分离<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He tore up the clothes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他把衣服撕碎了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We divided up the money.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们把钱分了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>向上的, 上行的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He caught the up train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他赶上了上行的火车。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>站起身, 提高(价格等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He upped and left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他站起身走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You simply couldn't up it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你根本不能提高了。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>prep.</i></font><br>(表示位置)在…的上端<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There was a workman up the ladder.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 有一个工人在梯子上工作。</font><br>(表示方向)朝…上, 向…上<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They climbed up a hill.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们爬上了山。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The ship is sailing up the Nile.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这艘船顺尼罗河向上游航行。</font><br>\n

uphold	<h3>uphold</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>支持, 维护<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They upheld our opinions.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们支持我们的意见。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We will loyally uphold the principles of the United Nations.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们将忠实地维护联合国的原则。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It's up to the government to uphold the rights of individual citizens.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 政府有责任维护各个公民的权利。</font><br>维持, 保持<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The Supreme Court is expected to uphold the death sentence.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 预计最高法院将维持死刑的原判。</font><br>\n

upwards	<h3>upwards</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>向上地, 上升地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The world urban population is rocketing upwards at a rate of 6.5 per cent per year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 世界城市人口以每年6.5％的速度急速上升。</font><br>\n
uranium	<h3>uranium</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>铀<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They went over nationwide in search of uranium mines.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们为了探寻铀矿走遍了全国。</font><br>\n
urine	<h3>urine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>尿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp These wastes are finally eliminated from the body in the urine.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这些废物最后从尿中排出。</font><br>\n
useless	<h3>useless</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>无用的, 无价值的, 无效的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's a useless fellow.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他是个没用的家伙。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His advise is useless to our project.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的建议对我们的计划没有什么价值。</font><br>差劲的, 不怎么样的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This method of working is useless.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这样做没成功的希望。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He is useless at maths.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的数学不好。</font><br>\n
utility	<h3>utility</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>功用, 效用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A fur coat has more utility in winter than in autumn.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 毛皮外衣在冬天比在秋天更有用。</font><br>公用事业<br>\n
utilize	<h3>utilize</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>利用, 使用<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cook will utilize the leftover ham bone to make soup.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 厨师要用吃剩的猪腿骨做汤。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is to be hoped that in her new job her talents will be better utilized than before.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 希望在她的新岗位上她的才干能够比以往得到更好的发挥。</font><br>\n
utter	<h3>utter</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>以口发出声音<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The wounded man uttered a groan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个受伤的人发出呻吟。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My name was uttered by someone near me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 近处有人喊我的名字。</font><br>说, 讲<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She didn't utter a word all night.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她整夜一言不发。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>彻底的; 完全的; 绝对的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He was in utter despair.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他完全绝望了。</font><br>\n
utterly	<h3>utterly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>全然; 完全地; 彻底地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I am utterly puzzled what to do with it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我全然不知道该如何处置它。</font><br>\n
vacation	<h3>vacation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>假期<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The children wait impatiently for the vacation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 孩子们焦急地等待着假期的来临。</font><br>\n
vaccine	<h3>vaccine</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>疫苗; 痘苗<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She takes a vaccine against influenza every fall.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她每年秋季接种流感疫苗。</font><br>\n
vacuum	<h3>vacuum</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>真空<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sound waves cannot travel through a vacuum.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 声波不能在真空中传播。</font><br>〈口〉真空吸尘器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I mean to buy a vacuum next month.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 下个月我打算买一台真空吸尘器。</font><br>空间; 空虚; 空白<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His resignation has left a power vacuum at the head of the party.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的辞职使得该党的领导位置出现了权力真空。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His wife's death left a vacuum in his life.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他妻子的去世使他的生活变得空虚。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>用真空吸尘器清扫(某物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I vaccum the carpet twice every week.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我每周用吸尘器打扫地毯两次。</font><br>\n
vague	<h3>vague</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>模糊的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Through the mist I could just make out a vague figure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 透过雾霭, 我只能看见一个模糊的人影。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The final letter is very vague; possibly an R or a K.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 最后一个字母很不清楚, 可能是R, 也可能是K。</font><br>(表达或感知)含糊的, 不明确的, 不清楚的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He had a vague idea of finding Anne and explaining it all to her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他隐约觉得要去找安妮, 向她解释所发生的一切。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He returned only a vague answer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他只给了个含糊的回答。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I haven't the vaguest idea who he is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我根本不知道他是谁。</font><br>不具体的; 不精确的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our holiday plans are still rather vague.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们的度假计划仍然没有明确。</font><br>\n
vain	<h3>vain</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>自负的; 爱慕虚荣的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She is one of those vain people who never take others' advice.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她属于那种自负得从不听别人劝告的人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I don't like a vain woman.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我讨厌爱慕虚荣的女人。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He's very vain of his abilities.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他对于自己的能力很自负。</font><br>徒劳的, 无用的, 无效的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He made a vain attempt to reach the drowning child.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他试图接近那个快淹死的小孩, 但没有成功。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp All my efforts were vain.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的一切努力都白费了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is vain to resist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 抵抗是没用的。</font><br>\n
valid	<h3>valid</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>正当的, 有充分根据的, 符合逻辑的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Do you have valid reasons for your absence?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的缺席有正当理由吗?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His excuse was not valid.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的借口靠不住。</font><br>有效的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He has a valid passport.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的护照有效。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This railway ticket is valid for three days.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这张火车票的有效期是三天。</font><br>有法律效力的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This is a valid will.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这是一份具有法律效力的遗嘱。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Is this contract valid?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这份合同有法律效力吗?</font><br>\n
valve	<h3>valve</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>阀, 活门<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The exhaust valve on my car has burnt out.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我汽车上的排气阀烧掉了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The feed-pipe is as clean as a whistle, so I'm afraid, if the oil is not getting through to the burner, the valve must be faulty.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 送料管干干净净, 所以我担心要是油不通过喷嘴, 阀门一定有毛病。</font><br>(心脏的)瓣膜<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The heart has valves to let blood flow in and out of it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 心脏有瓣膜控制血液流进流出。</font><br>真空管<br>\n
vanish	<h3>vanish</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>消失, 突然不见<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With a wave of his hand, the magician made the rabbit vanish.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 魔术师手一挥兔子便不见了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The smile vanished from her face.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 笑容从她脸上消失了。</font><br>不复存在, 绝迹<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Many types of animal have now vanished from the earth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 许多动物物种现已从地球上绝迹。</font><br>\n
variable	<h3>variable</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>变化的, 可变的, 易变的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The variable weather is a great trial to me.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这种多变的天气真是让我受不了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The speed of the windscreen wipers is variable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车挡风玻璃上雨刷的速度是可变的。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Our team's performance this year has been variable.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们队今年成绩很不稳定。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>可变因素; 变数<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you taken all the variables into account in your calculations?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在你的计算中有没有把所有的可变因素都考虑进去?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Speed was a variable in the experiment.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在该实验中速度是个变数。</font><br>\n
variation	<h3>variation</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>变化, 变动(的程度)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Prices are subject to variation.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 价格可以变动。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The dial records very slight variations in pressure.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 刻盘显示出压力有微小变化。</font><br>变奏(曲)<br>变异, 变种<br>\n

vest	<h3>vest</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈英〉女式背心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She was dressed only in a vest and underpants.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她只穿了一件汗衫和一条短裤。</font><br>〈美〉马甲, 背心<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You'd better wear a vest under a coat.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你最好把马甲穿在上衣里面。</font><br>(印有运动员编号的)运动背心<br>\n
vet	<h3>vet</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>审查(某人过去的记录、资格等)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The recruits were thoroughly vetted before they were allowed into the secret service.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 情报机关招募的新成员要经过严格的审查。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>兽医<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I took my dog to the vet.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我把狗带到兽医诊所看病。</font><br>\n
veto	<h3>veto</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>否决权, 否认权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The President has the power of veto.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 总统有否决权。</font><br>行使否决权<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Mother put a veto on our stayingout late.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 母亲不允许我们在外面呆到很晚才回来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>否决, 不同意<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp My father vetoed my plan.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我的父亲不同意我的计划。</font><br>\n

wherever	<h3>wherever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>conj.</i></font><br>无论什么地方<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I will find him wherever he may be.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 无论他在哪儿, 我都要找到他。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wherever possible, the illustrations are taken from literature.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 只要有可能, 例证都取自文学作品。</font><br>各处, 处处<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wherever the film star goes, there are crowds of people waiting to see her.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这位电影明星所到之处都有成群的人等着见她。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>(究竟)在哪儿<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wherever are you taking me?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你究竟要把我带到什么地方去?</font><br>\n
whisk	<h3>whisk</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>挥, 甩(某物)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The horse stood whisking its tail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那匹马站着挥动尾巴。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp With a whisk of its tail, it has gone.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 它尾巴一摇就跑了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He whisked the dust off his desk with a cloth.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用一块布把桌子的灰尘掸掉。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>搅拌器<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There is a tea whisk on the table.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 桌子上有个搅茶器。</font><br>掸, 拂(如马尾巴的摆动)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cow brushed off the flies with a whisk of its tail.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那头母牛尾巴一甩拂走了苍蝇。</font><br>\n
whisky	<h3>whisky</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>威士忌酒<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Alexander had drunk too much whisky.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 亚历山大喝了过量的威士忌酒。</font><br>\n
whistle	<h3>whistle</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>吹口哨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Who whistled just now?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 刚才谁吹口哨了?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The boy whistled a happy tune.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那个男孩用口哨吹了一支愉快的曲调。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He whistled a foreign tune to us.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他用口哨为我们吹奏了一首外国曲调。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He whistled to his friends to keep hidden.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他吹口哨通知他的朋友隐蔽起来。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>鸣笛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The train whistled and steamed off.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 火车鸣笛开走了。</font><br>呼啸着前进<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The cold wind whistled past.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 寒风嗖嗖吹过。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Another bullet whistled by.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 又一颗子弹呼啸而过。</font><br>空指望<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'm not prepared to use any firm's money to pay this man; let him whistle for his money!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我不想用任何公司的钱付给这个人, 让他做他的美梦吧！</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>哨子, 汽笛<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The referee blew a whistle at the end of the game.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 裁判在比赛结束时吹响了哨子。</font><br>口哨声, 汽笛声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp We heard the whistle of a train.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我们听到了火车的汽笛声。</font><br>\n
whoever	<h3>whoever</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>pron.</i></font><br>(引导名词性从句)谁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whoever wants the book may have it.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁想要这本书都可以拿。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll take whoever wants to go.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 谁要去我就带谁去。</font><br>无论谁, 不管谁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I'll find the person who did this, whoever he is.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我要找出干这件事的人, 不管他是谁。</font><br>究竟是谁<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Whoever could have done such a dreadful thing?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 究竟是谁能干出这种可怕的事呢?</font><br>\n
wholesale	<h3>wholesale</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>批发<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.&adv.</i></font><br>批发(的)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They own a wholesale business in clothes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们经营服装批发生意。</font><br>大规模(的)<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What the system needs is wholesale reform.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这一体制所需要的是彻底改革。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt.</i></font><br>批发<br>\n
wholly	<h3>wholly</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adv.</i></font><br>完全地, 全部地<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I wholly agree with you.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我完全同意你。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Your idea isn't wholly practical.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的想法并非完全现实。</font><br>\n
wicked	<h3>wicked</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>邪恶的, 恶劣的; 缺德的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp That was wicked of him.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他真邪恶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was a wicked accident.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 那事故非常严重。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp What wicked weather!</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 天气真糟糕！</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It is wicked to make other people suffer.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 让别人受罪就是作恶。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp It was wicked of you to torment the poor girl.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你折磨那可怜的女孩, 真是恶劣。</font><br>淘气的, 顽皮的<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Wicked children are quite annoying.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 淘气的孩子令人讨厌。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp You are being wicked again.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你又在恶作剧了。</font><br>\n

wrist	<h3>wrist</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>腕, 腕关节<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They took her by the wrist.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们握住她的手腕。</font><br>\n
X-ray	<h3>X-ray</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>X射线, X光<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp X-rays are used by doctors to examine the bones or organs inside our body.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp X光被医生用来检查人体内部的骨骼和器官。</font><br>X光检查<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp She went to the hospital for an X-ray yesterday.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 她昨天去医院作了X光检查。</font><br>X光片<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The chest X-rays showed moderate enlargement of the heart.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 胸部X光片显示出心脏稍有扩大。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>用X光摄影[检查, 治疗]<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They can't tell till they X-ray.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 在使用X光检查之前, 他们还说不上来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I've never X-rayed for two years.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我两年来没有做过X光检查。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Have you X-rayed your chest?</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 你的胸部用X光照过没有?</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They X-rayed her leg to find out if the bone was broken.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们用X光检查她的腿骨是否断了。</font><br>\n
yell	<h3>yell</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>叫喊, 号叫<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vt. & vi.</i></font><br>叫喊, 号叫, 叫着说<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp This gave them a chance to yell.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 这给了他们大声喊叫的机会。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp The crowd yelled when the hometown team scored a touchdown.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 当他们自己的队得了底线分时, 人群高声呼喊起来。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He yelled with fright.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他惊恐得大声喊叫。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They yelled the oath.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们大声宣誓。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp He yelled his defiance.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他大声抗议。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They yelled their goodbyes when the bus left.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 汽车开动时, 他们大喊再见。</font><br>\n
zinc	<h3>zinc</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>〈化〉锌<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 黄铜是铜和锌的合金。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His body is in short of zinc.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他身体缺锌。</font><br>\n
zoo	<h3>zoo</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>动物园<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp A zoo is a place where live animals are kept in captivity for the public to see.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 动物园是圈养动物以供公众观看的场所。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Two gorillas have escaped from the zoo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 两只大猩猩从动物园里逃跑了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp There are many animals in a zoo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 动物园里有许多动物。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Modern zoos are much better than they used to be.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 现代的动物园比过去的好得多。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp His sister works at Beijing Zoo.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他的姐姐在北京动物园工作。</font><br>\n
zoom	<h3>zoom</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>vi.</i></font><br>(飞机、汽车等)急速移动<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They got into the car and zoomed off.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们钻进汽车, 迅速开走了。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp They zoomed down to Folkestone on their bikes.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 他们骑着自行车向福克斯通飞驰而去。</font><br>(价格、费用等)急升, 猛涨<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp House prices zoomed last year.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 去年房价急剧上升。</font><br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp Sales have zoomed to 33 million.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 销售额已猛增至3300万。</font><br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>嗡嗡声, 隆隆声<br><i><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp I live near an airport and the zoom of passing planes can be heard night and day.</font></i><br><font color="Navy">&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 我住在一个飞机场附近, 昼夜都能听到飞机飞过的嗡嗡声。</font><br>\n
Zulu	<h3>Zulu</h3><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>n.</i></font><br>祖鲁人(南非班图人的成员)<br>祖鲁语<br><font color="DarkMagenta"><i>adj.</i></font><br>祖鲁人的; 祖鲁语的<br>\n
